info.title: BornToMe API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for the BornToMe Blog application. This API allows for user authentication, article management, and commenting functionalities.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all articles.

post.description: Creates a new article. The authenticated user will be set as the author.

get.description: Returns a single article by its ID.

put.description: Updates an existing article. Only the author or an admin can perform this action.

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to update this article

delete.description: Deletes an existing article. Only the author or an admin can perform this action.

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to delete this article

post.description: Creates a new user account and returns a user object and an access token.
Logs in a user and returns an access token and user details.
Invalidates the current user's access token.

get.description: Returns the details of the currently authenticated user.

post.description: Resends the email verification link to the authenticated user if their email is not yet verified.

get.description: Verifies the user's email address using the ID and hash from the verification link. This endpoint is typically accessed by clicking a link from an email.

parameters.name: expires
parameters.description: Expiration timestamp for the signed URL

400.description: Invalid verification link or hash mismatch.

403.description: Invalid or expired verification link (signature validation failed).

get.description: Returns a paginated list of books. Can be filtered by status, author, title, or price range.

post.description: Creates a new book. The authenticated user will be set as the seller.

get.description: Returns a single book by its ID.

put.description: Updates an existing book. Only the seller or an admin can perform this action.

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to update this book

delete.description: Deletes an existing book. Only the seller or an admin can perform this action.

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to delete this book

get.description: Returns a paginated list of users. This endpoint is restricted to administrators.
Returns user data. Admins can fetch any user. Regular users can only fetch their own profile.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of user to return (UUID format)

403.description: Forbidden - Cannot access this user's profile

put.description: Updates user data. Admins can update any user (including role). Regular users can only update their own profile (excluding role).

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of user to update (UUID format)

role.description: Admin only: Can update user role

403.description: Forbidden - Cannot update this user's profile/role

delete.description: Deletes a user. This endpoint is restricted to administrators.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of user to delete (UUID format)

403.description: Forbidden - Admin access required or cannot delete self
